segment.source: Change the Microsoft Surface Hub device account
segment.target: Change the Microsoft Surface Hub device account

segment.source: You can change the device account in Settings to either add an account if one was not already provisioned, or to change any properties of an account that was already provisioned.
segment.target: You can change the device account in Settings to either add an account if one was not already provisioned, or to change any properties of an account that was already provisioned.

segment.source: Change the Microsoft Surface Hub device account
segment.target: Change the Microsoft Surface Hub device account

segment.source: You can change the device account in Settings to either add an account if one was not already provisioned, or to change any properties of an account that was already provisioned.
segment.target: You can change the device account in Settings to either add an account if one was not already provisioned, or to change any properties of an account that was already provisioned.

segment.source: Details
segment.target: Details

segment.source: Value
segment.target: Value

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: User Principal Name
segment.target: User Principal Name

segment.source: The user principal name (UPN) of the device account.
segment.target: The user principal name (UPN) of the device account.

segment.source: Password
segment.target: Password

segment.source: The corresponding password of the device account.
segment.target: The corresponding password of the device account.

segment.source: Domain
segment.target: Domain

segment.source: The domain that the device account belongs to.
segment.target: The domain that the device account belongs to.

segment.source: This field does not need to be provided for Office 365 accounts.
segment.target: This field does not need to be provided for Office 365 accounts.

segment.source: User name
segment.target: User name

segment.source: The user name of the device account.
segment.target: The user name of the device account.

segment.source: This field does not need to be provided for Office 365 accounts.
segment.target: This field does not need to be provided for Office 365 accounts.

segment.source: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address
segment.target: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address

segment.source: The SIP address of the device account.
segment.target: The SIP address of the device account.

segment.source: Microsoft Exchange server
segment.target: Microsoft Exchange server

segment.source: This is the Exchange server of the device account.
segment.target: This is the Exchange server of the device account.

segment.source: The device account’s username and password must be able to authenticate to the specified Exchange server.
segment.target: The device account’s username and password must be able to authenticate to the specified Exchange server.

segment.source: Enable Exchange services
segment.target: Enable Exchange services

segment.source: When checked, all Exchange services will be enabled (for example, calendar on the welcome screen, emailing whiteboards).
segment.target: When checked, all Exchange services will be enabled (for example, calendar on the welcome screen, emailing whiteboards).

segment.source: When not checked, all Exchange services will be disabled, and the Exchange server does not need to be provided.
segment.target: When not checked, all Exchange services will be disabled, and the Exchange server does not need to be provided.

segment.source: What happens?
segment.target: What happens?

segment.source: The UPN and password are used to validate the account in AD or Azure AD.
segment.target: The UPN and password are used to validate the account in AD or Azure AD.

segment.source: If the validation fails, you may need to provide the domain and user name.
segment.target: If the validation fails, you may need to provide the domain and user name.

segment.source: Using the credentials provided, we will try to discover the SIP address.
segment.target: Using the credentials provided, we will try to discover the SIP address.

segment.source: If a SIP address can't be found, then Skype for Business will use the UPN as the SIP address.
segment.target: If a SIP address can't be found, then Skype for Business will use the UPN as the SIP address.

segment.source: If this is not the SIP address for the account, you will need to provide the SIP address.
segment.target: If this is not the SIP address for the account, you will need to provide the SIP address.

segment.source: The Exchange server address will need to be provided if the device can't find a server associated with the login credentials.
segment.target: The Exchange server address will need to be provided if the device can't find a server associated with the login credentials.

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub will use the Exchange server to talk to ActiveSync, which enables several key features on the device.
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub will use the Exchange server to talk to ActiveSync, which enables several key features on the device.
